website_summaries.verdict: Offers acceptable airflow, quiet operation, and a sturdy, compact build for an amazing price – hands-down the one to get if you want a great fan on a budget.
pros: Considering the compact housing, consumers report being amazed at the excellent airflow this fan produces
Its rugged handle, 3 speeds, and 2 accessory circuits add convenience to its practicality
cons: The plastic housing isn't as sturdy as models made of metal
The motor is a little noisy, and the entire fan has the tendency to rattle

website_summaries.verdict: This air mover offers superior drying power at a budget-friendly price, but it may not hold up well over time.
pros: Includes circuit breaker with reset button
Two 120-volt outlets built in for accessory use
Easy to adjust the direction of the airflow
cons: Some complaints about the machine breaking shortly after purchase

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than two months
customer_reviews.text: Worked for less than two months. Turned it off tonight. Turned it back on ten minutes later and it made a much different noise than usual, flatter than usual, and when I checked, no air was coming out of it. Took it upstairs and tried it on another outlet and same thing. Fully died in less than two months. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisN

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FAN....
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!! Talk about a surprise!!!! I took this out of the box and told the wife...don't throw away the box cause I'm sending this back. After plugging it in I AM SURPRISED AT THE AIRFLOW!!!! This fan puts out 3 times the regular airflow of a fan twice its size!!!! Im impressed...and yes we are keeping it and ordering another soon for the other bedroom and hall!!!!! GREAT FAN!!!!! Really like the adjustment up and down. lets me put the airflow right where I need it and not everywhere else. PS....it isn't that noisy either. All I hear is the air flowing, not the motor. We use it at night in the same room with no problems.....
customer_reviews.author: Loving Amazon Prime...

customer_reviews.title: Excellant fan to help circulate air.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase this fan to help circulate the A/C in my large living room, my ceiling vents are poorly placed----I'm not really sure what to say, this thing sort of does "too good of a job" this thing really blows some air and I love it. I've used the box fans and the 18" fans on stands, but they aren't even close to what this does. I've had to raise my temperature level on my A/C thermostat (good thing) because of the velocity of the air this thing blows. In fact I've ordered another to put in a hallway to move air better to my bedroom. Buy yourself one or even two, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Bigharleyguy

customer_reviews.title: Very good fans. I've got three of these and also ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good fans. I've got three of these and also the slightly larger but similar Lasko blower fan. The Lasko moves more air, but I like these better because the build quality is better. If the Lasko fan is on an uneven surface the flimsy frame distorts and the rotating cage inside rubs on the frame. These Stanley fans have heavier frames and bodies, so they run well no matter what orientation you put them in. I haven't taken one apart for cleaning yet, but it looks like it will be pretty easy to clean. The output grating is not easily removable, so there is room for improvement, but overall this is a very good fan.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a piece of crap!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan for my daughter to use at her house in N Hollywood. She waited until last week to open the box and when she turned it on for the first time it started making a grinding/growling noise so obnoxious as to be totally unusable. Now I'm reading on your site the "return window" closed weeks ago. DO NOT UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT. I AM VERY DISAPPOINTED AND WANT MY $52.00 BACK.
customer_reviews.author: WI Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, long power cable!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, quieter than expected and blows a good amount of air. Really like the two plugs on the side. The power cable is super long too!
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: not good. The wind is strong, but it takes less than a month to break. I have been in a place that hasn't moved, I haven't been driving for a long time, I haven't touched it, I haven't missed it. Just suddenly stopped. I have tried the socket on the side of the fan and it still has electricity. That is, the fan machine does not move. not good!
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: It was good, for about a week.
customer_reviews.text: The blower worked well for about a week, now it’s making a loud noise while blowing. I honestly didn’t expect it to be one of the best blowers, but I did expect it to be Quiet. I wouldn’t recommend this blower.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: i liked this fan when it worked
customer_reviews.text: i liked this fan when it worked! sadly, I only used it five times before the motor started running slower and a burnt plastic smell started. of course it's after the return period. hopefully others have better luck
customer_reviews.author: a chan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was going to rate this as a 5 star. But since then the unit has started making a rattle noise and has become very loud which represents a bad bearing.... very disappointed in the quality since I've only had this since August 16th... Stanley used to be great products but no more stay away from these fans
customer_reviews.author: mitchell h.

customer_reviews.title: Its a blower
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after having to keep the windows closed due to all the smoke in the air. A good and bad thing of having really good insulation. So bought this and kept it on pretty much 24/7 for a month and a half and never had any issues with it. When I was at work I kept it on the first/slowest setting and turned it up to the third/highest setting when I got home. When it got really bad i used some towels and water to jerryrig a swamp cooler setting and it worked great. I might buy two more next summer so I can get a trifecta effect going on :-D
customer_reviews.author: Brian D

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved mine yesterday, It blows pretty good besides the fact that the propeller broke, less than 5 mins of use and makes an irritateing clicking noise when it rotates would of been worth the money if the thing wasn't completely plastic maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Curry

customer_reviews.title: what a junker!
customer_reviews.text: Fan did not even last two months before the unit burned out and became an over-sized paperweight. Gave it one star simply because I couldn't give it the level it deserves. Definitely not worth the $70 after tax and shipping
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: for indoor trainer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my indoor cycling trainer, to reduce the amount of sweat. I read reviews and chose this for the price over the ones with remotes. 1. air flow- I rode two rides, and only needed level 1. I am sure on hotter days and harder workouts level 2 would be nice. I can't imagine a 3 needed. 2 Surprised how cool the air came out, that was unexpected. 3 Noise, it is really low, my music was not drowned out at all, and it wasn't even on loud. 4 love that I can change the angle of the air flow 5 the extra outlets come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: 655704 - BEST FAN EVER MADE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan with everything I have. It’s been by my side every minute of every day since August 9th, 2018. It’s now a year later and I’ve put this thing through it’s misery, but it still stands! I have dropped this fan from about 5 feet, I have left it on running for days straight. I live in Texas and this summer was no joke, and I love the cold, so this fan was literally the only thing that kept me sane. It is amazing and I would definitely buy more than one at any given time!
customer_reviews.author: Zachery Magallanez

customer_reviews.title: Not a good air mover
customer_reviews.text: Something to remember when purchasing this product. The Intake for this fan is on the side and at a very low point. So if you're putting the fan in a narrow location, then the air intake has to be considered because it will greatly impact the outlet the outlet. The intake and exhaust are both obstructed by a wide Grilled structure, thus limiting the air output. As far as the noise goes, I don't know if I would consider sleeping with that noise as I would with the regular 20 inch box fan. It did have an really nice heavy duty long cord on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Jones A. Addict

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Zwift
customer_reviews.text: Wahoo sells an overpriced "Wahoo Headwind" fan that apparently has some sort of bluetooth interaction with Zwift when you ride on your trainer in doors. Really? I need this? I need to pay that much for a fan? The Wahoo Kickr or Cycleops H2 smart trainers are costly, but worth it in my opinion. The Headwind fan...not so much. I just need is a fan to get some airflow to keep me from overheating while I ride my trainer. This works extremely well for that purpose at a fraction of the cost of the Wahoo. I highly recommend this as an alternative solution for my fellow Zwift nerds.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin J. Zumbaum

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it didn't.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan June 2019. After receiving it, I used it maybe 5-10 times while working outside during 2019 summer and it worked nicely. However, on September 26, 2020, I put this under my house to help dry out humidity. Today is October 8th and I noticed I couldn't hear it anymore. I just got under the house to find that it had quit working. The reset switch doesn't make it work again. There was no water under the house, so it wasn't because of exposure to water. I feel this fan should have lasted much longer. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST FAN ON THE MARKET
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan and you will too. It will cool the room down so quickly. Living in NYC with no Air conditioner is no joke. However, this fan make AC unnecessary. NO matter how humid and hot it is, my little fan keeps my apt cool and comfortable. This is the best fan on the market for the money. In fact for any money, you will love this powerful little air conditioner of a fan. Love this fan
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive a remote control, Although the review screen mentions one. This fan worked phenomenal for the first three or four days. The air quality is less than average now... It doesn't blow air nearly as hard. I've tried cleaning it. Nothing works. It's also extremely noisy. I heard great things about this product that I have been very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and silent
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. It dries my wet floor within minutes after being mopped. It doesn't have a rumbling noise (like most box fans), and when I let it blow out the smoke while I'm cooking, within half an hour to an hour, the smoke is scattered. However, it's so powerful that I wouldn't sleep in the same room with it; it is better off blowing from the hallway. I do wish the turn dial is in a more practical and convenient spot, but for it's worth, I don't mind it.
customer_reviews.author: Lue Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Terribly misleading sales effort by Amazon here - mixing different products
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Lasko 4900 blower in July 2013. Its a great product. Quiet and moves a lot of air. Six years later I want another one, but I go with the Stanley version to save a few bucks. Its on the same page here at Amazon. Its treated like a color difference but its branded differently of course. But the Stanley product is a joke compared to the Lasko version. Its a small toy. Its outrageous that the things are mixed on this page. The Lasko is much beefier. I have ordered a 4900 now. I'll be bummed if Lasko has made that one smaller...
customer_reviews.author: futz

customer_reviews.title: Nice Flow and Price Could Less
customer_reviews.text: The STANLEY 655704 High Velocity Blower Fan - Features Pivoting Blower and Built-in Outlets by Lasko came quickly and is completely assembled and the air flow is good so far. The pivot head and two outlets come in handy too. I will have to give it time to see if this fan lasts for the $50+ I spent for it during a major heatwave. I do not know how one would clean this yet since dust does collect in fans. It is like having three box fans and less noice and space. It is lightweight and easy to move from room to room. If it does not last at least a year or more, I will report back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine and in any direction you need
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it to use in my basement that is always having water issues. This does work, but not any better than my stand up tower fans. It does blow cool air, and you can point it in any direction which is super convienient. I would buy it again, just depends on what you need it for. I knocked over a large bucket of water in my kitchen and after Mopping it all up this fan did dry my floor in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Saving money on electric bill
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. It is great and not very noisy. I hope it will last because I have it on all the time circulating the air in my large family room. It has helped with my central air electric consumption. It has been really hot in Texas for the last couple of weeks. My Central Air is kicking on less frequently. I get a daily reading of my electric consumption and compared to last year at this time, it has remarkedly lowered. The size is small and doesn't stick out in the room. I can put it behind a chair and point it upward and it is not visible to anyone in the room. I wholeheartedly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S., Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Volume Of Air At So Little Od Wattage At Decent Price
customer_reviews.text: So I had bought it for my garden working with my own wind power that powered by off-grid solar. The high power setting is around 75 watts per hour. Medium power setting is around 60 watts. The low setting is around 45 watts per hour is very cheap-breeze. You can also use it for blow-dry your steamed cleaned carpet during low humidity. It also blow at the top as other brands that blow out from the bottom. It also has several clickable tilt setting for even better aimed. Good News: It also has 2 plug in outlets that you can plug it to work light, radio and cordless powered tools battery charger.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: This thing blows...literally!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thing because I'm a musician and here in SWFL we play outside....a lot and in the summer, even though we're under cover it's still brutal. After carrying around a table top fan I broke down and bought this one. Lot's of blowing power and it remains quiet. I have 2 other friends who are also musicians and I found out they have the same one. It works great and it's light.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. LeBrun

customer_reviews.title: This fan MOVES air!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second fan of this type. The first one lasted many years, and I use it all the time. Great to move quantities of air from one room to another, or cold air from the floor up to recirculate the warm air from the ceiling. Have a room that's too hot or too cold? This can even things out. While it's wonderful for drying wet carpet, I almost never have used it for that. Instead, I use it to reduce my energy bill by moving air from one place to another. LOVE this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: I love this fan
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this fan. I dropped it a half dozen times and it’s still going strong without any problems. Amazing airflow and small factor allows me to prop it up on stuff to blow level on. After a hot shower I prop the fan outside bathroom blowing air in and all the steam is gone within a few minutes allowing me to shave and wipe down the bathroom afterwards. It’s an excellent fan at clear smells from the house and smoke. Though it is louder than a box fan especially on high speeds but with the amount of airflow it produces it is to be expected. Best fan I have owned for indoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite fan!!! I love sitting on the front porch watching the weather or people going by and dog walkers. Well my fan is on a little table on the porch and it keeps me nice and comfy. It blows so much air!!! I am the proud owner of two of them now!🥰 Mine has even gotten rained on more than once and it’s still going!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy a big fan buy one of these and get blown every night.
customer_reviews.text: Every house should have one of these. Not just for drying the floor But as a directional fan. It’s quiet and blows harder than your favorite girlfriend in high school. Don’t buy a big fan buy one of these and get blown every night. I hope you liked my review.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Connelly

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. Small, lightweight, and powerful. Can be adjusted to blow at different angles. We loved our first one so much that we immediately ordered another one. Every house should have this. One is being used in our wet basement to dry the floor. We also used one outside on a hot, still day while building our new porch. It lent a lot of relief to the heat and we could plug in our tools to it. Air carries a long distance and actually helped keep the bugs off of us.
customer_reviews.author: P.T.

customer_reviews.title: I got a used one
customer_reviews.text: This fan was delivered 30 minutes ago , as you can see on the pictures it has scratches and it looks like it was used... The bottom part is detached and there’s no way to put it back on because it seems it was a manufacture defective or a retuned item because of the scratches. I’m very disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: I love to shop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much for indoor living even in hot SW Florida. Prior, I had a much cheaper pedestal fan and I had to have it blowing right by me on the highest level. This unit blew that one away and on the lowest level. No pun intended. I'll be sitting on the lanai even on the hottest of days. This is definitely a solid purchase for me. It doesn't feel chea.p at all. Very nice and heavy construction. This going to come in handy when I paint the interior of the house
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCrazy

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made for price.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is of poor quality. Bottom part of stand by rubber foot broke off. This fan was lightly used to dry a few small carpets. Why bother buying this if it can't even be used in the house for simple things like drying a carpet. Hey Stanley do the right thing and send me the replacement part!!!! I do not recommend this fan, poor design and cheap parts make this fan a do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: If your tired of buying high velocity fans that don't last over six to eight months......
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a blessing to making my sleep time so comfortable ! I can't sleep without some air blowing on me . I was so burnt out on spending close to $200.00 on all of the fans that stopped running before a year was up ! This product has saved me money, and made my sleep time so much better ! It's built to last and the air it circulates is unbelievable ! It pivots ( as in up and down ) and has three speeds that will put a big smile on your face .Its much quieter and very efficient than even I could imagine ! I would highly recommend this product to anyone !
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: It Blows!
customer_reviews.text: Awsome qualities regarding this fan - 1. It is consistent with the wind produced, no gaps in air flow, 2. The geniuses put outlets on the side - its like being able to use it as an extension cord!\ 3. It's small but it really moves air. 4. Its portable and I like to use my fans where ever I do! Great Product
customer_reviews.author: Adam S

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working; unresponsive customer service
customer_reviews.text: Was nice when it worked. Unfortunately started loosing power and then stopped completely after about 10 months of sporadic, non-commercial use. Called Lasko customer service multiple times only to find "unusually long wait times" each attempt. Tried leaving message for callback, but never heard from them. Warrantee is useless if you can't contact Lasko. Fan is useless if it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect to be able to run this thing overnight for months on end. It gets wobbly and shakes to death...my lasco never did that [plus it's kind of small, but that's probably more related to the price...]
customer_reviews.author: rogerdpack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little Blower
customer_reviews.text: I love this little blower. I use it to dry my wet floors after mopping & to dry my couches after I clean them. It drys everything in a timely manner. I even use it as a fan at night, but of course I have to turn it off in the middle of the night because it's so powerful that we start freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy another
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 for my shop on Feb 28th 2019, at $58.99 each. Today is June 14th 2020. First one broke and went to trash within a few months. Second one the fan broke loose inside the fan cage and makes a very loud annoying racket but still works. Third one works but not very powerful. Bought a cheap lasko from Walmart for $49.99 that puts out about 3x the air flow as the stanley. Now they want $135 for the same product. I wont’t buy another
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: As most things these days, this fan is a temporary disposable product. It lasted 3 months before starting to screech loudly. The manufacturer's solution is to ship it to them at my expense and they'll evaluate to see if they will repair or replace. Shipping costs will run about the value of the fan. Better option, find a better built brand and buy it. This one in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this as a fan for my outside or to be used in my garage when I workout. It works great even the lowest cool blows like crazy. I am very pleased with my purchase. I love the adjustable front.
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Fan is quiet for the amount of air it moves
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about a month ago, have used it most days since then. Quiet, moves a lot of air, impressive for it's size. Makes a bit of noise simply because it is blasting high velocity air out the grill. I don't notice any motor noise at all. Reviewers say new model moves even more air due to larger intake on the plug side. l built in outlets are useful. I use them more than I thought I would.
customer_reviews.author: Guv

customer_reviews.title: Great all around fan. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. I’ve used it for a number of things including cooling off some rooms in the house. A little noisy but it’s definitely tolerable. A tad on the expensive side but I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Cabello

customer_reviews.title: Super high powerful airflow . Even at 20 ft away.. wow!!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding, even unbelievable air flow, quiet and focused. Built by lansko. Never been happier. If it makes noise like a couple reviews just return and exchange for free. Mine is perfect!! Will buy another for the patio. (I live east coast Florida, raging hot with humidity) so happy !! Build quality could use improvement, it’s been dropped couple times and now has that rattle like something is touching the fan..
customer_reviews.author: karston Musselman

customer_reviews.title: Better than a dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to dry out my basement after a series of torrential rains in the area. I had been using a dehumidifier to attempt to take the moisture out, but the floor and walls were still wet. My sister suggested a fan to move the air. I, of course, went to Amazon to find what I needed. This is a remarkable unit. I especially like that I can direct the air flow . . . either up, down and straight forward. It dries out an area within 30 minutes. I move it around to the next area that needs attention and pretty soon, I have a dry basement . . . until the next rain.
customer_reviews.author: alfigler

customer_reviews.title: Great overall fan
customer_reviews.text: Not remote controlled on my model but semi noisy and doesn’t cool 20 degrees maybe 7 or 8 but at least it has lasted a summer, now it’s winter and sometimes I turn it off otherwise it is ALWAYS ON so I think good quality. One time used harsh chemicals in-house and had to ventilate and worked well to push bad air out one door while good air came through the back.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended fan
customer_reviews.text: I work outside sometimes and needed a fan. This fan is better than my expectations. It is really strong and feel nice even you are outside while it’s warm. There’s 3 speed level and it feels really good even you use it in level 1. Also it can be useful for drying your floors fast because fan rotates 360 degrees so you can either use it for above or floor level. I’ve been using it long time and didn’t give me any problem. I use it in my garage right now and it feels great while the garage is warm. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ermanermiles

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: My husband literally sleeps with this at night. We keep it on our dresser about 15 feet away and I feel like I am getting blown away. It's not crazy loud, and very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Beason

customer_reviews.title: Menopause lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver for anyone going through the change. It is small enough to take around with you and pretty powerful to cool those hot flashes . The 2 outlets are handy for charging your phone and plugging in the icemaker.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Cat Girl

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 6 months and only used it a handful of times and it abruptly stopped working. For the price, it should have lasted longer than the one I've had for years from Harbor Freight that still works.
customer_reviews.author: Shorty

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Item came without any packaging except original box appearing somewhat dented on corners. Fan wouldn't operate when first plugged in then smelled of burned odor. Completely inoperable and had to reorder replacement. Will update with new item.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: PRICE CHECK
customer_reviews.text: i had one of these a while ago and loved it, left it behind when i moved and was looking to get another one. it's an awesome little fan and the power strip is a great bonus, but im pretty dissapointed to see the price jacked up when people need stuff like this the most.
customer_reviews.author: daniel beebe

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to clean & service
customer_reviews.text: When this fan gets dusty and dirty; it’s really difficult to clean. Disassembly is very difficult, to the point where it feels like you’re going to break a lot of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the Lasko blower fan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my job. Being that we have Lasko blower fans. These were a good price and they work great they are smaller than the Lasko fan. I thought they would be the same size but are not. Stanley is a smaller version and blows less air but are very good and do blow lots of air but not as much as the Lasko. If you want stronger air flow go with Lasko. If you want a smaller blower fan go with the Stanley brand. I believe for an apartment the smaller would be better. There both great blower fans.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good air mover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an "open box" type sale price of $37.65 from Warehouse Deals, Inc. and am thrilled by that deal. It arrived promptly (I have PRIME) and works perfectly, though the original equipment box is in terrible shape. On high, it's not whisper quiet by any means, but it sure does move air! It is worth the original asking price of $55-65 but, if you can find a good one from a site with mostly good reviews, don't be afraid of an open box sale.
customer_reviews.author: Kleine

customer_reviews.title: Lower Quality Build
customer_reviews.text: We have the older Blue Lasko models and they have run nearly 24 hours a day for three years and seem brand new still. We wanted a third one and this is the comparably priced model now. I ran it for 1 hour and could not stand the noise and vibrations it created. It made the whole flow hum loud due to vibration. Sent it back. May be fine in a garage but not in a home.
customer_reviews.author: Potter Fan

customer_reviews.title: Works great on our large room with high ceiling. Yellow color is not the greatest if putting somewhere noticeable.
customer_reviews.text: Moves a lot of air! We use this on the lowest setting to blow the warm air down out of our coffered ceiling. The faster settings are louder but would be useful for drying out after a flood or helping paint or stain dry more quickly. The room we use it in is 30' x 60' with an 18' ceiling. A more sedate color option would have been preferable to the bright yellow body color but we were able to position it in such a way that it is not too noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Great for "Other Uses"
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to blow away the hot air coming in my direction every time the Pres. of our company turns on the portable heater...oh, and the perfume he's wearing. For the record our workplace has no windows, and it's an open workspace. But he tends to feel cold easily, so he needs to blast that portable heater. As for me, my way to counter the heat and "fragrance" coming towards my direction will be to put a powerful fan on my desk. I have it positioned upward. And it's quiet enough. Great fan.
customer_reviews.author: K.T.

customer_reviews.title: What a great fan.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to move air from the rear of the home to the living space. I can feel the wind from 20 feet away. It's quite and powerful. A real winner! Built like a tank.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor/utility fan.
customer_reviews.text: I live in San Antonio where it gets hotter than hell during the summer months. I bought three of these fans to place in outside sitting areas. The fans are much quieter than the traditional large outdoor fans we used to have. After a bad rain storm that brought both heavy rains and wind, I expected to find my fans tossed about the yard and ruined by the rain. Nope. Fans were in place and although water spilled out of one of them, it started right up. These fans are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: keeps me so cool at work
customer_reviews.text: i work in an automotive shop in a desert. this thing keeps me so cool at work, dries me off when i get sweaty (because my city is so dry) my one and only complaint (which isnt even so bad) is that it pretty much blows in a straight single direction and air doesn't travel in too much of an area. however, it does push air pretty far in that straight line. but im adapted to it, im in love with it
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fan!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is incredible. The second floor of our home is often stuffy from spring to fall once the temperatures get to the 70s. This fan circulates the air and cools it as if it’s a mini air conditioner. I purchased two initially and I will be getting more. I love this fan! It’s a little on the loud side but not bad. Overall, it’s one of the best purchases I have made.
customer_reviews.author: Hasperdm

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again for the price I paid for this one!!
customer_reviews.text: Although I wouldn't have purchased this if it was labeled Lasko, as they put out the replaceable box fans, I DID see that their name was there when I purchased it. It blows a far higher volume of air than I expected, I'm actually not looking for quiet, but just the opposite, so I can't really comment on that. It sits steadily, and that's a surprise. Angle adjustment is very easy and solid. Very strong for its size I think. I would have bought another one, but of course, they suddenly go up in price 30%, we all know how Amazon plays that game.
customer_reviews.author: SFO Bro

customer_reviews.title: Bad product don't last or atleast mine didn't
customer_reviews.text: When we first got it worked great 3 months later it made so much noise you couldn't stay in the same room with it i took it apart used some white lithium grease on the bearings it helped far awhile and finally after the 4th or 5th month the motor went ou so i don't recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: We live in a log home that retains heat. Recently the 80 degree weather has been intolerable. We do not have central air or an air conditioner. I took a chance on this high velocity fan and im glad i did. It is the bomb dot com! This thing pushes out so much cold air. I have decided not to get A.C. because this fan works as well as it does. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Truly Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: Was surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that the price was to good to be true, but this is exactly what I wanted and needed, it's great for when my work space floods and after using the shop vac this gets turned on and it dries out much faster now,
customer_reviews.author: Mistress Purple

customer_reviews.title: Great Blower Fan
customer_reviews.text: I used it to dry some wood flooring after a water spill. It works fine but be aware it doesn't have a heater. On HIGH it moves quite a bit of air. I like that it's easy to aim up or down, and it doesn't slip. A little noisy if you're going to be in the same room but this is a comment, not a complaint. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hinsdale Paul

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give it 6 stars
customer_reviews.text: This fan works better than expected. I was skeptical when I was shopping for this but I saw a video someone shared showing the strength of the blower and I figured I'd try it out. I was not disappointed. It is hot in Georgia and this fan comes in handy when I'm working in the basement or yard or even when I just have people over and we hang out outside. The only problem I have is there isn't enough fan to go around so I may end up buying another one. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great air movement strong blower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan to help move the warm air from my wood stove around my house. It is excellent for that application I'm not really sure how well it would dry floors for carpets but I imagine it would do decent at that job it has a very strong blower and moves a lot of air I would definitely recommend it it is not too loud and does a great job
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Circulates a TON of air
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, first one still going strong. Don’t use them for drying anything. Use them in the house to circulation a ton of air. I think they work better than traditional type fans. I get the air circulation I want, and not just a little at a time, I get a lot all the time. Five Stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar Vogtmann

customer_reviews.title: Powerful compact blower fan does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a godsend. I am a professional musician in Hawaii and outdoor gigs can be brutal in the summer. This thing keeps me from looking like a sweaty mess on stage and it matches my graffiti yellow strat so it earns a few style points too. The outlets on the side are a great convenience as well. I mean if you’re gonna draw ten amps, ya better power some of my other stuff too... 😂
customer_reviews.author: James Addison Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Fan for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant about buying this fan at first. I needed a lot of air flow in my garage and wasn’t for sure if this would do what I wanted it to do. Tennessee Summers get pretty nasty with the humidity. After reading a couple of reviews, I decided to give this fan a shot. Let me tell you- this thing blew my mind. This fan being a smaller size, actually had a lot of power. This fan is very well designed and has great airflow. An added bonus are the extra outlets on the side. I would buy this fan again.
customer_reviews.author: Problematik

customer_reviews.title: I've given it a true beating and it's still great
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good about this. I've been chucking this thing in a trailer and using it in nasty outdoor conditions for a long time now. Great power for the size, outlets on the side are super useful. Buy one for outside and one for inside to keep the heating bill down. Also good for floods or getting water off a stage.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Stanley fans
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these fans to cool off my house, etc. They work great, have adjustable speeds as well as adjustable aim (aim high, low, in between). Been quite happy with them...they are a bit noisy, but not as bad as some other larger box fans we've used. I like the small size for the power you get.
customer_reviews.author: D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It actually deserves 5 stars in my book, however I am not a stickler about a little noise, it's very monotone and constant. It doesn't bother me, but some may have to get used to it. For the blowing power, and keeping you cool, it does a great job. I have a similar one, twice the size and twice the price, I should have bought this first, it's a Stanley after all.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary A Sleight

customer_reviews.title: love that it has two outlets on it for outdoor ...
customer_reviews.text: makes much less noise and more compact vs the larger oscillating fans. love that it has two outlets on it for outdoor use. i work at the ports of LA found out about these when i saw the port mechanics use these on the field. very light for what its worth and durable. i got one of these that i put at a certain angle of my living room. i dont have to turn the volume all the way up on my tv when i got these at full blast/crank (levek 3 on the adjust)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan DeMesa

customer_reviews.title: Powerful fan, but a bit noisy.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my house to help keep it cool vs me running my air conditioner all day long. It does a pretty good job of keeping it moderately cool. It's a fan so don't expect it to be as effective as an AC. On the high setting, it is pretty loud/annoying so I usually only go to 1 or 2 on the knob. But for the price you can't really beat it, cools my house better then a Dyson fan.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We love this an. We did not get it to dry we got it to use as a bedside fan. We needed something that would last and blew strong. This sucker is great it blows strong on 1 we have turned it up just to see but it is plenty powerful enough on one. And it's not really all that loud. No louder than a normal fan set to high when it's on low. But blows way more air.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Massey

customer_reviews.title: Completely worth every dollar! Works great
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a lifesaver and works so well! I’m using it to keep my room cool because my fan does not work and it’s amazing! It’s a really powerful fan and I only use it on the lowest setting and it’s perfect. The noise level is noticeable but I sleep pretty well with it running every night, I barely notice the noise. I have had no problems with the machine running, no problems at all! I have been using it every night for about 5 months now approximately, runs perfectly! Completely worth my money
customer_reviews.author: Mel Melkonian

customer_reviews.title: Pushes good air for a small unit. Nice Product.
customer_reviews.text: I am a musician and bought this as a personal air source for live performances based on recommendations by band mates. I was skeptical, especially because of the nearly $60 price. However, this is a fantastic product. It is small enough to pack and travel easily with my gear but provides a nice whallop of air for such a small unit. I have used it twice so cannot yet speak to its reliability but am happy with it so far. I wouldn't recommend connecting musical equipment or a mixer (anything sensitive to electrical noise) into the onboard outlets for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Adman

customer_reviews.title: 2 minutes of air?!
customer_reviews.text: I was working in a night area and I though to my self well sense I'm in a non-ventilated area lets get some air in here. plugged in unit and two minutes later .... nothing, tried different outlets tried to reset the unit nothing. so in short, if you want two minutes of good air, good choice. if you want something that works... get something ells.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wells

customer_reviews.title: Flexible
customer_reviews.text: A nice unit. The angles that the head stops at are flexible enough that you can aim it anywhere from right in front of it to straight up. The three speeds are useful and the unit relatively quiet. Using it to dry out some minor foundation weeping during very heavy rain on one basement wall (2 ft wide x 10 ft long wet floor. ) Might also use it on the deck during hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Tomczyk

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding fan moves a lot of air
customer_reviews.text: This fan blows a very strong, steady stream of air directly where you point it. It adjusts up and down with a number of clicks, has 3 speeds, and is not particularly loud, even on its highest setting. We use it to send cooler air upstairs in our two-story house that gets a bit warm on the second floor during hotter summer temps. This is actually the second one we've purchased, because we like having another one to use as needed elsewhere. Very recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David and Deb

customer_reviews.title: Moves a ton of air. QUIET. Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This compact fan is the best I've ever had. We don't have fans in our living room, but this thing moves tons of air silently on high speed. Way more than ceiling fans, or oscillating fans. Great value. I dropped it down the stairs 5 minutes after I opened it, no damage! Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: David King

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It's quite, compact, easy to store, efficient with air flow, easy to move around. I love it! I recommend this blower to any and all who have a domestic or commercial need. I just needed a fan for the hot summer at home, and I'm so glad I didn't go to Walmart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for many home uses! Love it after mopping it dries my floors so quick, I also open my dishwasher after it’s run and this helps to dry it all out, and I even love it when I get out of the shower and I am hot for cooling off and drying off. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Hoodschwinked

customer_reviews.title: Best attic blower
customer_reviews.text: Best use for Attics!! My husband is a Satellite Technician and his job requires for him to go in hot attics!!! This is the best tool he ever carried with him for the heat. He turn it on and it is strong enough to circulate a karge space in the attic. Will be coming back for more. The beauty of this is that it also has two outlets just u may want to plug in a lantern.
customer_reviews.author: Azteca

customer_reviews.title: ... the box was slightly damaged though the product was fine. It has a very plastic smell when it ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived and the box was slightly damaged though the product was fine. It has a very plastic smell when it is blowing but I am hoping that it will go away after use till then I cant shut the bedroom door. It is also very loud even on the lowest setting which my son doesnt seem to mind so i guess it is okay. It works really will in cooling down a room. I have a Swamp Cooler and it isnt working so his room get really hot but this fan works like a champ to cool it down
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Mathis

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Usually I wouldn't review a product the first day I received it...However with this I will make an exception. This is by far the best fan I've purchased! It's not that big, quite portable, and the cool air is amazing! The force of the fan does make it a little louder than some fans, but the air is well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Heavy duty Fan
customer_reviews.text: I use this fan at work to ventilate cars that I am working on (interior work). Excellent. It has a large volume of delivered air. It's quiet and easily adjusted for angle of air delivery and of course the blower speed. I highly recommend this specialized fan.
customer_reviews.author: James W Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Moves air well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to move air in a very hot and humid environment. It does move air. It is somewhat loud and I believe there are other products that may do better. It works well for what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I didnt pay much attention to the overall dimension given in description. I assumed this would be about the size of similar fans ive seen. It's actual size is smaller than what i expected. The power is also less than expected. With all the good reviews on this product I was easily swayed. The overall price and product is still satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Cee DeLoy

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for velocity you may want to step up to the next model. This on really doesn’t blow like we would for it to and you need to set it very close to you to capture the air.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis James

customer_reviews.title: Time tested runs great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan. I have run it every night to help me sleep for at least seven hours for over a year now. I have also run it for multiple days without rest. I have taken it to gigs (drummer) in dusty hot places. It STILL is balanced, as quiet as when new, puts out just as much air. I will only ever buy these fans in the future. The power outlet on the side is good enough for a shop vac.. has a fat cord that’s plenty long.. 8 or 10 ft.
customer_reviews.author: Jdtexastea

customer_reviews.title: Super Powerful and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan, it blows air hard and the 3 settings really do make a difference. Where ever you need air to move this fan will do it. Also the fan tilts up and down to get the right flow to where you need it and there power outlets work great. A recommended purchase if you are looking for a fan of this type. Dr. Dave
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan and Looks Nice Too
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan, looks great and moves a lot of air with a reasonable amount of noise. Ours had a defective switch though, so only speeds 1 and 3 were working. Returned for a replacement. We use the fan for cooling and white noise while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, powerful, light
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me you like sleeping with a fan on and sometimes it feels nearly impossible to get a box fan to point at you while you're laying down. Well this little fan solved that problem immediately and helped me get some of the most restful nights sleep. But if you're using this to dry small projects it works great too
customer_reviews.author: Angel Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Best fan in the world
customer_reviews.text: I live in Missouri and in the summer it gets extremely humid here. This thing is a life saver, literally. Perfect for extreme heat. Haven't ever used the outlets on it but its perfect for keeping your room cold. Its really loud but it just turns into white noise eventually. Well worth the price too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: STANLEY 655704 High Velocity Blower Fan - Features Pivoting Blower and Built-in Outlets
product_meta.description:
STANLEY’s High-Velocity Blower Fan is packed with features to help at the worksite. Patented pivoting action allows you to direct the airflow right where you need it–from floor to ceiling and anywhere in-between. Three high-velocity speeds and a focused airstream bring powerful performance. Plus 2 additional outlets, a circuit breaker with reset, and a grounded plug for safety and convenience.

Additional features include: 

 * Two 120-volt accessory outlets
 * Built-in carry handle
 * Pivots to direct air flow & circulation
 * 3 high velocity speeds
 * Fully assembled
feature_bullets: 3 High Velocity Speeds - makes this small but powerful blower fan ideal for a range of applications. Perfect for a job site, garage, around the shop, and around the house. The powerful blower provides a cooling breeze wherever you need it.

Pivoting Head to Direct Air Flow & Circulation - allows you to direct the high velocity air where you need it. A wide pivot angle lets you aim the air towards the floor, ceiling, or anywhere in between.

Twin 120-Volt Accessory Outlets & Built-in Circuit Breaker - means no more reaching for extension cords while you're working. With 2 industrial outlets located on the side, you'll be able to plug in power tools and charge your phone within reach. Built-in circuit breaker protects against overloading.

Cool, Ventilate, Exhaust, & Dry - with this versatile blower fan. The high velocity power provides concentrated air to cool you down on a hot day and is also great for providing ventilation, or even acting as a dryer for wet areas.
Fully Assembled - and ready to use right out of the box. Simply plug the cord into an electric outlet and you're ready to go. This portable utility fan is perfect for the home or the job site.CFM:289

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
